description: Impose simulated ensemble mean monthly mean 3D ozone concentrations from the CMIP6 historical experiment throughout the depth of the atmosphere.
name: CMIP6 historical total Ozone
rationale: Input for models with interactive chemistry that has been turned-off for the purposes of the DAMIP hist-totalO3 simulations.
longName: CMIP6 historical ensemble mean monthly mean total ozone concentrations
keywords: CMIP6 historical, ozone, concentration, O3, total
